subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ken Griffey Jr., the active leader in home runs with 615 through Friday, may not be bopping them the way he used to, but he has transformed the Mariners’ vibe, in particular Ichiro Suzuki’s.
snippet: Ken Griffey Jr., the active leader in home runs with 615 through Friday, may not be bopping them the way he used to, but he has transformed the Mariners’ vibe, in particular Ichiro Suzuki’s.
